statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, created_at FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT record_id, device_id, record_data FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-05-31' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS record_count, MAX(created_at) AS latest_record_date FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '456e89b7-12d3-456a-4266-1a74b000001';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT record_id, created_at FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_records WHERE device_id = '789e4507-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT patient_id, record_data->'diagnosis' as diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_data->'heart_rate' > 80
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM created_at)) as avg_age FROM healthcare_records
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT record_type, record_date FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_data->>'blood_pressure' = '120/80';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_owner FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE device_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_type FROM healthcare_records WHERE record_type = 'diagnosis' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM healthcare_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE device_location IS NOT NULL AND device_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE device_owner = 'Jane Smith' AND device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM AccessControl WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT access_id, device_id, patient_id FROM AccessControl ORDER BY access_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM MedicalDevices WHERE device_type = 'Monitor' ORDER BY manufacturer, device_name;

SELECT Patients.full_name, MedicalDevices.device_name, AccessControl.permission_level FROM Patients JOIN AccessControl ON Patients.patient_id = AccessControl.patient_id JOIN MedicalDevices ON AccessControl.device_id = MedicalDevices.device_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type='Sensor';
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_id, name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT Patients.name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id

SELECT Patients.name, COUNT(MedicalRecords.record_id) AS record_count FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.name HAVING record_count > 2
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis, prescription, timestamp FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM medical_iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'Heart Rate Monitor' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM medical_iot_devices WHERE device_location IS NOT NULL AND device_type = 'Temperature Sensor' LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, access_level, grant_timestamp FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 'a12b3456-c78d-90e1-f23a-456b7890c123' ORDER BY grant_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_records GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM medical_iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'wearable' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.access_level FROM users u JOIN access_control a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.access_level = 'admin';
